extension_description.message: Gathers all the links in a webpage and opens a music player with the songs (.mp3, .ogg, .flac, .m4a, etc.).

dl_current_playlist.message: Download the current playlist as Zip

failed_files_ignored.message: If "No" is selected, then failed files will be ignored

error_reload.message: An error occured. Please refresh the page before retrying.

from_a_list.message: From a list of direct links to music files

from_a_list_help.message: URLs must be separated by commas (,)

load_url_error.message: An error occurred while loading the page

persist_playlist_on_close.message: Persist the current playlist after exiting the player?

keyboard_controls_help.message: You can interact with important elements of the user interface using the tabulation, shift and return keys, just as usual. Specific behaviors are described below.

from_a_webpage_help.message: Once you have found an open directory containing songs, you can either use the popup to scan it or copy and paste the url in the text box below. Found songs will be added to the current playlist.

from_a_list_help_tooltip.message: If you want to import only specific songs from an open directory, you can either right-click the link and select "Open with NSzx Music Player" or copy and paste the link to the songs in the text box below.

quickstart_1.message: Open the "Search open directories" menu by clicking on the search icon.

quickstart_2.message: Enter your query and hit "Return" key [â†µ]. It will perform a Google search and display the results.

quickstart_3.message: Find what you look for. Warning: some open directories are not really open, the files may be locked behind an authentication system. Unfortunately, nothing you can do here, you'll have to keep searching.

quickstart_4.message: You can then add the songs to your current playlist or replace it entirely.

quickstart_2_1.message: When navigating open directories, you can open the popup of the extension to look for songs in the page.

local_tuto_1.message: Allow this extension to access your local folders.

local_tuto_2.message: Drag and drop a folder from your file explorer into a new Google Chrome tab. You can then navigate your folders inside Chrome.

local_tuto_3.message: Scan the page for songs as any other webpage.

leaving_message.message: Do you really want to leave this page?

delete_playlist_confirm.message: Do you really want to delete this playlist?

confirm_add_many_tracks.message: You're about to import _nb_ tracks, it may take a while. continue anyway?

must_reload.message: The page must be reloaded for this change to be taken into account.

not_available_firefox.message: Google Analytics cannot be enabled in Firefox

downloading_progress.message: In progress... (__q__ in queue, __s__ downloaded, __f__ failed)

system_shortcuts_help.message: The player responds to keyboard shortcuts system-wide. You can control the player even from another tab or another application with the following shortcuts:

change_system_shortcuts.message: You can change the shortcuts associated with these actions in the Chrome extensions settings :
